title: J M J HOLDINGS
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: j_m_j_holdings
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.9M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with J M J HOLDINGS. The average
  contract duration was 1.17 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $6.1M.
  The longest contract was 2.33 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $27.2M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.9M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '31%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.4'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '844.8K'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.17'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '6.1M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '2.33'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '27.2M'
